SELECT A.id, A.system_code AS systemCode, A.model_name AS modelName, A.class_name AS className, A.class_desc AS classDesc, A.class_url AS classUrl, A.method_name AS methodName, A.method_desc AS methodDesc, A.method_url AS methodUrl, A.request_type AS requestType, A.enabled, A.last_update_by AS latUpdateBy, A.last_update_date AS lastUpdateDate FROM iap_sys_api_t AS A where 1=1
AND A.system_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{iapSysApiT.systemCode},'%')
AND A.method_desc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{iapSysApiT.methodDesc},'%')
AND A.enabled = #{iapSysApiT.enabled}
ORDER BY A.model_name
